member.name: M:DynGPT.OpenAI.ChatGPT(DynGPT.OpenAIModel,System.String,System.String,System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Send natural language questions to any OpenAI model and receive accurate responses.

member.name: T:DynGPT.OpenAIModel
member.summary: Define a specific OpenAI language model to be utilized by the Chat node.

member.name: M:DynGPT.OpenAIModel.CodeCushman_001
member.summary: Almost as capable as Davinci Codex, but slightly faster. This speed advantage may make it preferable for real-time applications. Max Tokens ≤ 2048

member.name: M:DynGPT.OpenAIModel.CodeDavinci_002
member.summary: Most capable Codex model.Particularly good at translating natural language to code.In addition to completing code, also supports inserting completions within code. Max Tokens ≤ 8000

member.name: M:DynGPT.OpenAIModel.TextAda_001
member.summary: Capable of very simple tasks, usually the fastest model in the GPT-3 series, and lowest cost. Max Tokens ≤ 2048

member.name: M:DynGPT.OpenAIModel.TextBabbage_001
member.summary: Capable of straightforward tasks, very fast, and lower cost. Max Tokens ≤ 2048

member.name: M:DynGPT.OpenAIModel.TextCurie_001
member.summary: Very capable, but faster and lower cost than Davinci. Max Tokens ≤ 2048

member.name: M:DynGPT.OpenAIModel.TextDavinci_002
member.summary: Most capable GPT-3 model. Can do any task the other models can do, often with higher quality, longer output and better instruction-following. Also supports inserting completions within text. Max Tokens ≤ 4000
